settings.title: FOR THE LOVE OF THE GAME
Sign up and save
settings.text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers.

settings.heading: A NEW COLOR INSPIRED BY THE CALIFORNIA SANDS

settings.title: Love transcends all labels, colors, stigmas, you name it.

settings.heading: LOVE TRANSCENDS ALL LABELS
settings.subheading: THE BLACK RAINBOW COLLECTION IS HERE

settings.heading: SUBSCRIBE TO THE LOVE LETTER
settings.text: Promotions, new products and sales - directly to your inbox

settings.title1: INSPIRE OTHERS TO LIVE THROUGH LOVE

settings.title: It all started with one word — LOVE
settings.text:
Love is a noun, a verb, and a way of life.

We wake up every day and choose love. We want to change the way people treat each other, the world, and themselves. There’s a lot of talk about love and making the world a better place, but we’re actually taking and inspiring action. We’re not selling another ‘love’ shirt or piece of ‘love’ art. We’re reminding people that they matter with our words and actions, and we’re inviting you to join us.

This is an active state of caring. This is a movement of people who operate out of love, not fear. This is acting from the heart. This is Live Through Love.

settings.title: MAKING AN IMPACT
settings.text: By using the urban landscape as his canvas, Ruben encourages communities to change for the better through optimism and collaboration. These once vacant walls are now vibrant reminders that inspire those who see them to dream big, feel beautiful, live in possibility, and to love. Ruben’s murals can be seen in cities across the country and around the world from Paris to New York and Florida to Mississippi.

settings.title1: WE SPREAD OUR MESSAGE THROUGH SEVERAL OFFERINGS

settings.subheading1: Ruben’s portfolio of work extends past empty wall canvases. He is a TED speaker, helping spread the message of art creating impact, a product designer and also a corporate consultant.
settings.title3: LET'S ALL SHARE IN THE LOVE

settings.title1: IT ALL STARTED WITH ONE WORD — LOVE

settings.title: LIVE THROUGH LOVE: THE BOOK
settings.text:
Poetry, philosophy, and personal reflection. A collection of empowering messages for when you need them most.


“If there’s one thing I’ve learned in my journey, it’s that it’s easy to question our belonging, worth, and value. I believe that each and every one of us belongs here and brings so much value to those around us. By living through love: showing it, sharing it, and wearing it, we are supporting each other to shift the pendulum toward love and away from fear.” –Ruben Rojas

settings.title: DISCOVER SELF-LOVE
settings.text: Within the pages of this easy-to-understand book, you’ll discover timeless wisdom in the poetry of Ruben’s words. You’ll not only fall in love with Ruben’s philosophy, but you’ll fall in love with yourself, and that is a life lesson that will last forever.

settings.title: WRITE YOURSELF A LOVE LETTER
settings.text: Dive deep and write those love letters to yourself. There are no rules, especially when it comes to defining your own self-love. When you live through love, that perfect imperfection blooms vibrantly, and you can’t help but genuinely smile when you see your own reflection.

settings.title: TURN UP THE HEAT WITH LOVE
Click on any of the icons below to read feature articles covering Ruben Rojas and his 'Live Through Love' Movment

ART IS LIFE. LIFE IS ART. All of the works on this page are one-of-a-kind originals by Ruben, inspired by his iconic murals and signature style. Sold pieces are for reference and can be commissioned for new work in that similar style. Due to the abstract nature of Ruben’s art, no two pieces will look alike.

settings.title: ART IS LIFE. LIFE IS ART.
settings.text: You’ve seen his murals. Now, bring his message home. All of the works on this page are prints of originals by Ruben, inspired by his iconic murals and signature style.

settings.title: MISSION
settings.text:
It all starts with one word: love. Love is a noun, a verb, and a way of life.

We wake up every day and choose love. We want to change the way people treat each other, the world, and themselves. There’s a lot of talk about love and making the world a better place, but we’re actually taking and inspiring action. We’re not selling another ‘love’ shirt or piece of ‘love’ art. We’re reminding people that they matter with our words and actions, and we’re inviting you to join us.

This is an active state of caring. This is a movement of people who operate out of love, not fear. This is acting from the heart. This is Live Through Love.
